ROW.NAME: （增值税发票系统升级版纳税人）购票信息

ROW.DATDSC:
--升级版纳税人购票信息 select rownum,dual.* from ( select b.nsrsbh "纳税人识别号", b.nsrmc "纳税人名称", (select nsrztmc from DM_GY_NSRZT zt where b.nsrzt_dm=zt.nsrzt_dm) "纳税人状态", (select hymc from DM_GY_HY hy where b.hy_dm=hy.hy_dm and hy.yxbz='Y') "行业", issmqy "是否商贸企业", fddbrxm "法人姓名", FDDBRSFZHM "法人身份证号", FRCJQK "法人采集情况" , CWFZRXM "财务负责人姓名", CWFZRSFZHM "财务负责人身份证号", CWCJQK "财务负责人采集情况", BSRXM "办税人姓名", BSRSFZHM "办税人身份证号", BSRCJQK "办税人采集情况", GPRXM "购票人姓名", GPRSFZHM "购票人身份证号", GPRCJQK "购票人采集情况", (select fpzlmc from DM_FP_FPZL zl where c.fpzl_dm=zl.fpzl_dm) "发票种类名称", to_char(d.lrrq,'yyyy-mm-dd') "最近一次发票领购日期", d.fpsl "最近一次发票领购数量", e.fpjcfs "发票结存份数", c.myzggpsl "每月最高购票数量", c.mczggpsl "每次最高购票数量", c.dffpzgkpxe "单份发票最高开票限额", --c.cpzgsl "持票最高数量", to_char(c.yxqq,'yyyy-mm-dd') "票种有效期起", to_char(c.yxqz,'yyyy-mm-dd') "票种有效期止", --c.yxbz "票种认定有效标志", b.zcdz "注册地址", (select swryxm from DM_GY_SWRY swry where b.SSGLY_DM=swry.swry_dm) "管理员", (select name from v_swjg sw where sw.id=substr(b.zgswskfj_dm,0,7)) "税务机关", (select swjgmc from DM_GY_SWJG jg where b.zgswskfj_dm=jg.swjg_dm) "主管税务所（科、分局）"
from ( --取未完全采集升级版纳税人 select * from ( select a.* ,b.nsrzt_dm,b.hy_dm,b.djxh,b.zcdz,b.ssgly_dm,b.zgswskfj_dm, (case when b.hy_dm in (select hy_dm from DM_GY_HY start with hy_dm in('52','51')connect by prior hy_dm=sjhy_dm) then '1' else '0' end ) issmqy from tax_smqy_ybnsr a ,dj_nsrxx b WHERE (a.nsrsbh=b.nsrsbh or a.nsrsbh=b.shxydm) and b.nsrzt_dm in ('01','02','03','04') and b.yxbz='Y' and b.djxh in (select djxh from dj_djhglgl where lb_dm='000000000028' ) and not ((frcjqk='1' and cwcjqk='1' and bsrcjqk='1' and gprcjqk='1') or((b.fddbrsfzjlx_dm !='201' or length(trim(fddbrsfzhm))<15) and cwcjqk='1' and bsrcjqk='1' and gprcjqk='1') or( a.FDDBRXM is null and cwcjqk='1' and bsrcjqk='1' and gprcjqk='1' ) or(frcjqk='1' and a.CWFZRXM is null and bsrcjqk='1' and gprcjqk='1') or (frcjqk='1' and cwcjqk='1' and a.BSRXM is null and gprcjqk='1' ) or (frcjqk='1' and cwcjqk='1' and bsrcjqk='1' and a.GPRXM is null) or (frcjqk='1' and cwcjqk='1' and a.BSRXM is null and a.GPRXM is null) or (frcjqk='1' and a.CWFZRXM is null and bsrcjqk='1' and a.GPRXM is null) or (frcjqk='1' and a.CWFZRXM is null and a.BSRXM is null and gprcjqk='1') or (a.FDDBRXM is null and cwcjqk='1' and bsrcjqk='1' and a.GPRXM is null) or (a.FDDBRXM is null and cwcjqk='1' and a.BSRXM is null and gprcjqk='1') or (a.FDDBRXM is null and a.CWFZRXM is null and bsrcjqk='1' and gprcjqk='1') or (frcjqk='1' and a.CWFZRXM is null and a.BSRXM is null and a.GPRXM is null ) or (a.FDDBRXM is null and cwcjqk='1' and a.BSRXM is null and a.GPRXM is null ) or (a.FDDBRXM is null and a.CWFZRXM is null and bsrcjqk='1' and a.GPRXM is null ) or (a.FDDBRXM is null and a.CWFZRXM is null and a.BSRXM is null and gprcjqk='1') ) and a.nsrmc like '%[%NSRMC]%' and hy_dm in (select id from v_tax_dm_hy start with id=decode('[%HY]','',id,'[%HY]') connect by prior id=sjhy_dm) and nsrzt_dm like '[%NSRZT]%' and substr(zgswj_dm,0,7) in (select id from v_swjg start with id='[%ZGSWJG]' connect by prior id=sjid) ) t where issmqy like '[%SMQY]%' ) b, ( --发票票种核定: select CPZGSL, --持票最高数量 MCZGGPSL, --每次最高购票数量 MYZGGPSL, --每月最高购票数量 FPZL_DM,--发票种类代码 DJXH, --登记序号 SWJG_DM, --税务机关代码 YXBZ, --有效标志 YXQZ, --有效期止 DFFPZGKPXE, --单份发票最高开票限额 DFFPZGKPXE_DM, --单份发票最高开票限额代码 SJGSDQ, --数据归属地区 YXQQ --有效期起 from FP_PZHDXX where yxbz='Y' and (swjg_dm like '14511%' or sjgsdq like '14511%') ) c, ( --取不同发票种类的最近一次购票时间和数量 select * from ( SELECT djxh,fpzl_dm,fp_dm,fpsl,fpqshm,fpzzhm,lrrq,ROW_NUMBER()OVER (PARTITION BY djxh,fpzl_dm ORDER BY lrrq DESC ) RN from ( select a.djxh,b.fpzl_dm,b.fp_dm,b.fpsl,b.fpqshm,b.fpzzhm,b.lrrq FROM FP_LY a,FP_LY_MX b where trim(a.fplyuuid)=b.fplyuuid and ( b.zgswskfj_dm like '14511%' or b.sjgsdq like '14511%') ) )where RN=1 ) d, ( --纳税人发票结存 select djxh,fpzl_dm,sum(fs)fpjcfs from ( select to_char(djxh)djxh,NSRJCUUID,fpzl_dm,fs,FPQSHM,FPZZHM, FPZT_DM,lrrq ,xgrq from hx_fp.FP_NSRFPJC@js3q where (ZGSWSKFJ_DM like '14511%' or sjgsdq like '14511%') --and djxh ='10114501000046779118' order by djxh,lrrq desc )group by djxh,fpzl_dm ) e where b.djxh=c.djxh(+) and c.djxh=d.djxh(+) and trim(c.fpzl_dm)=d.fpzl_dm(+) and c.djxh=e.djxh(+) and trim(c.fpzl_dm)=e.fpzl_dm(+) ) dual
